verses.roman:
"alpa aparādha, prabhu karaha prasāda
ebe śikṣā ha-ila nā karibe aparādha"

synonyms: alpa aparādha—the offense is not very great; prabhu—O Lord; karaha prasāda—be merciful; ebe—now; śikṣā ha-ila—he has gotten a sufficient lesson; nā karibe—he will not do; aparādha—offense.
translation: "Haridāsa has committed a small offense," they said. "Therefore, O Lord, please be merciful to him. Now he has received a sufficient lesson. In the future he will not commit such a offense."
